actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the Joint Committee on the Library to commission a painting of the astronauts first landing on the moon on the ceiling of the Brumidi corridor in the Senate wing of the Capitol.

summary.text: Authorizes the Joint Committee on the Library to commission a painting of the astronauts' first landing on the moon on the ceiling of the Brumidi corridor in the Senate wing of the Capitol.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the Joint Committee on the Library to commission a painting of the astronauts first landing on the moon on the ceiling of the Brumidi corridor in the Senate wing of the Capitol.
